channel.title: Ix Soulcist xI Should be a mod, just saying
channel.description: Ik most of you are going to be like "oh we don't need anymore mods" but i just wanna say this guys awesome, and very active and I think hes deserves it ;) He has like 1200+ posts (not spam ones) and he joined in like October, plus he got 200 rep in that time.

aah you guys are so gullible

item.title: Ix Soulcist xI Should be a mod, just saying
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:11, topic:372125”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=468177.msg3422866#msg3422866 date=1291666456]

So, out of curiosity. How much did you get payed?

Na I just like the guy, plus im getting pissed seeing how many topics thats should really be locked or deleted just floating around for like days and no one doing anything.
[/quote]It’s because no one reports them. Many mods have told me they only see 1 report active at a time, so it’s obvious that topics that are reported get dealt with.[/quote]
I always report them, hmm guess we just need to train our new community members then.

Read full topic
